alfredsnippet.snippet:
"The ability to theorize is highly personal; it involves art, imagination, logic, and something more. An outstanding genius may invent a successful new type of theory; first-rate men may follow the lead and develop other theories on the same pattern; less competent minds are embarrassed by the custom of testing predictions."

- Edwin Hubble, The Realm of the Nebulae (1936), p.5
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Hubble on Theorizing
